metadata.name: Suspicious Git Clone - Linux
metadata.comment: Detects execution of "git" in order to clone a remote repository that contain suspicious keywords which might be suspicious

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('/git')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' clone ')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('exploit')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('vulns')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('vulnerability')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rce')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('remotecodeexecution')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('invoke-')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cve-')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('poc-')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('proofofconcept')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('proxyshell')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('log4shell')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('eternalblue')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('eternal-blue')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('ms17-'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of "git" in order to clone a remote repository that contain suspicious keywords which might be suspicious
